txt.en: The gate of Entwade remains strong as the Orc force dwindles
Slain Orcs and Uruks litter the ground at Síric's feet
Aid Agelman and Éowyn in defending Entwade
Éowyn can be found inside Entwade in eastern Kingstead.\n\nYou have repelled the White Hand and brought some measure of peace to the Wade. You should now speak to Éowyn.

'You have come just in time, [placeholder]!

'The Orcs are upon us, and we cannot allow them to raze the palisades!

'We will slay any that make for the gate, but you must defeat those that attack the fence! Swiftly now!'

'The White Hand shall not trouble the Wade again, [placeholder].\n\n'While Edric may never have those he lost back, I know he felt what he did was right and I trust his dedication to his duty. I hope this can bring some sense of closure to him.'
Follow Éowyn to the western flank
<rgb=#FF0000>The Men of Entwade must not be defeated</rgb>
Éowyn is standing outside the Mead Hall of Entwade.\n\nYou should speak to Lady Éowyn and drive the White Hand from Entwade.
Hoping to cut down the White Hand invaders once and for all, Éowyn rides to Entwade with vengeance in her heart.

'It is as I feared! The White Hand have already begun their strike against Entwade.

'We must move swiftly to aid Thane Edric's men in holding against the Enemy's forces.

'Follow me, [placeholder]!'
Éowyn can be found near the Mead Hall of Entwade.\n\nYou should follow Éowyn.
Thane Edric's men can be found to the east of the Mead Hall of Entwade.\n\nYou should aid Agelman and Éowyn in combat.
Anrad can be found at the gate of Entwade near the Sutcrofts.\n\nYou have defended the southern flank of Entwade and should now secure the gate.
Mordor Orcs can be found outside the gates of Entwade, hacking at the nearby fences.\n\nAnrad has asked that you slip past the Orcs at the gate and engage Orcs attacking the walls of Entwade.
Síric can be found in northern Entwade with Womar and Gifel.\n\nYou should seek out Síric and aid him.
Síric is in northern Entwade.\n\nYou have discovered Síric and his men amidst slain White Hand forces. You should speak to Síric.

'[placeholder], it is good to see you again!'

'These wretched Orcs will trouble us no longer, but what of the others?'

You speak of the forces you encountered in the south and east of Entwade.

'Aye, that is heartening! We have slain all they mustered here, but we must secure the western flank.

'Let us move swiftly, lest the White Hand gain the advantage!'
Éowyn and the others can be found to the west.\n\nÉowyn is running toward the western flank of Entwade. You should follow her.
Nâdar can be found at the western edge of Entwade.\n\nYou have encountered the leader of the White Hand forces in Entwade. You should defeat him.
Defeat Orcs attacking the palisades of Entwade
